plot: Jim and Taylor team up in a last stand against the Phoenix Group, a colonist makes the ultimate sacrifice and a decision is made that will change life in Terra Nova.

The Phoenix team overwhelm the Terra Nova campsite while Taylor's remaining men hide in the forest. For mysterious reasons, the next step is clearing out the southern desert with mega-bombs. Lucas ultimately finds, traps and fights father Taylor, who is amazed the grudge goes deeper and weirder then he feared since he let his wife die to save Lucas's life. Jim decides the only hope for a lasting defense in shutting off the time portal.—KGF Vissers

The Shannon family is rescued by Taylor that witnesses with Jim the murder of Washington by Lucas, who executes her shooting in her head in cold blood. Jim discloses to Taylor that Washington asked him to tell Taylor to remember Cu Lao Cham. He tells to Jim that in this battle in an island, they destroyed the bridge to the continent to avoid the enemy to send more soldiers. So now they decide to destroy the portal to avoid the depletion of Terra Nova and prevent more Phoenix mercenaries to come from 2149. Jim offers to destroy the Hope Plaza that he had break in and isolate Terra Nova from 2149. They set a sophisticated plan in motion.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
